segments.text: Looking at this scene, the woman's so engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate shines as she wipes it with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink's faucet is still on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing wildly onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's huge now, lapping at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed at all; incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy's precariously balanced on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar with glee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off this heist right under mom's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The unstable stool makes my heart race a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden basks in daylight, all peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of calm and chaos in one room.
segments.speaker: PAR
